newsitem.title: CHINA: BP China petrochemical jv signs $80 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: BP China petrochemical jv signs $80 mln loan.

text.p: British Petroleum Co PLC and two Chinese partners have signed an agreement with three banks to borrow $80 million, Xinhua news agency said on Thursday.
The three banks are Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp, a unit of HSBC Holdings PLC, Fuji Bank and Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi, it said.
The borrower was Yangtzejiang Acetyl Petrochemical Co Ltd, a venture which involves a total investment of 2.1 billion yuan, it said.
The agreement was signed in the southwest China city of Chongqing where the joint venture between BP and its local partners is based, it said but gave no more details. ($1 = 8.3 yuan)
